goal: I'm looking for an investment property. On Zilloft, find three multi-family homes for sale in Denver, CO under $950,000. Then, create a calendar event for this Friday at 2 PM titled 'Review Denver Investment Properties' and paste the Zilloft links for all three properties into the event's description field. Finally, send a brief email to investment.group@gomail.com with the subject 'Q3 Investment Prospects', and in the body just write 'Please review the calendar invite for this Friday. I've added the properties we should discuss.'

evals.description: Verify a calendar event was created with the correct title.
